name: resolution_type
question: Would you prefer a refund or store credit? Refunds may take a few days to be reflected in your account after return. Store credit is applied as soon as we've verified the return.
validationRule: must be one of the 2 options
agentInstructions: you can infer the response based on the user. They don't have to enter the exact word.

name: return_method
question: Will you be shipping the product back or returning it to our store?
agentInstructions: If the user asks where to return: https://www.mystore.com/storelocations - If they wish to ship it back we will provide a return label and send it via email.

name: return_reason
question: Why are you returning? (defective/wrong product/wrong size or fit)
validationRule: must be one of the 3 options
agentInstructions: you can infer the response based on the user. They don't have to enter the exact word.

name: email_confirmation
question: Please provide your email address
validationRule: must be a valid email address

name: order_number
question: What's your order number?
validationRule:
Accept order numbers in format: ORD-XXXXXXX (7 digits)
Also accept invoice numbers: INV-XXXXXX
agentInstructions: If user says "I don't have it", guide them: "Check your order confirmation email or your account order history"
